name: Get Mother's Milk
description:
GET MOTHER'S MILK: FIRST QUEST EDITION

This Ultra Early Access Incompletely Unfinished Barely Begun Edition of Get Mother's Milk features the exclusive first completed quest of the game. Players will experience what it is actually like to mow a neighbor's lawn, and absolutely nothing else!

========================

This is our first "release" of the game. We've been developing our various game systems, including Quest System, Dialogue, Items, and a simple Turn-Based Combat System (not playable in this release). but very little is completed beyond that. We are actively developing this game. It is in very early stages as of right now, but we would love to get any thoughts on everything we've put together thus far.

We plan to upload regular updates and track our progress weekly on the devlog. Please let us know what you think! We would love feedback of any kind.
